tossup_question: 1) EARTH AND SPACE  The Coriolis effect is caused by which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Earth’s revolution
X) Earth’s rotation
Y) Earth’s tilt
Z) The Moon
bonus_question: 1) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following would increase air pressure?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Increasing temperature
X) Decreasing altitude
Y) Increasing humidity
Z) Decreasing gravity
